sources.title: Tough to Handle (1937)
sources.description: A young reporter's grandfather wins a sweepstakes, but it turns out that his ticket is phony. The reporter finds out that the police are looking for the criminal ring responsible for the phony-sweepstakes racket, so he and his young brother set out to track down the gang responsible and expose them. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/tough-to-handle-1937/

sources.title: Tough To Handle
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Tough to Handle - AKA Scavengers of Broadway
sources.description: Frankie Darro and Kane Richmond team-up to stop a gang of racketeers.

sources.title: Tough to Handle (1937) FRANKIE DARRO
sources.description:
Stars: Frankie Darro, Kane Richmond, Betty Burgess
Director: S. Roy Luby

A young reporter's grandfather wins a sweepstakes, but it turns out that his ticket is phony. The reporter finds out that the police are looking for the criminal ring responsible for the phony-sweepstakes racket, so he and his young brother set out to track down the gang responsible and expose them.

metadata.Plot: A young reporter's grandfather wins a sweepstakes, but it turns out that his ticket is phony. The reporter finds out that the police are looking for the criminal ring responsible for the phony-sweepstakes racket, so he and his young brother set out to track down the gang responsible and expose them.
metadata.Writer: Peter B. Kyne, Robert Lively, Betty Laidlaw
metadata.Actors: Frankie Darro, Kane Richmond, Phyllis Fraser
